question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. wooden chair on the left
B. chair next to the dining table
C. None
D. None

options.B: chair next to the dining table

triage_reason: The two chairs are both in the background, and their relative depth is ambiguous in the 2D image without a depth map or clear foreground/background cues.
